channel.title: Chapter 2: background music not playing
channel.description:
The background music in chapter 2 isn't playing and I get the following errors in the console:
[code]Failed to create decoder for MP3 [ music\bms - theme (crazymix).ogg ] Attempting to play MP3 with no vaudio [ music\bms - theme (crazymix).ogg ][/code]

item.title: Chapter 2: background music not playing
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
See this thread with dev comments.

https://steamcommunity.com/app/362890/discussions/0/312265473879300053/

BMS Chicken Chonnage;312265526374538357:

In the past, this has been caused by using Windows 10 with some missing redistributables. This should have been fixed by us flagging the game to install them automatically. I wonder what’s happened here.

Can you please try downloading and installing these, and seeing if this helps?

VC 2013
VC 2010

Read full topic
